title: Potato and Taleggio Roly-polies with Chive Dip

ingredients.content: 330 g floury potatoes, cut in pieces (3 cm)
15 g dried morel mushrooms, soaked in boiling water for 30 minutes, then squeezed
100 g Taleggio cheese, cut in pieces (2 cm)
½ bunch fresh chives, finely sliced, plus extra for garnishing (optional)

preparations.content: Place water and 1 tsp salt in mixing bowl. Insert simmering basket, weigh in potatoes then steam <b>30 min/100°C/speed 1<b>. Remove simmering basket with aid of spatula, mash potatoes in simmering basket with a fork then leave to cool for 20 minutes. Discard steaming water.
After cooling time, preheat oven to 200°C and line a baking tray with baking paper.
Place shallots and morels in mixing bowl then chop <b>6 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add reserved mashed potatoes, egg, cornflour, Taleggio and 1 tsp salt then knead <b>45 sec/<b>.

On a lightly-floured surface, unroll puff pastry and cover evenly with potato mixture, leaving 3 cm on one long edge, then starting from the other long edge, roll up into a log. Cut the roll into 8 pieces (approx. 4 cm) then place flat on prepared tray.
Bake for 20-25 minutes (200°C) until golden. Meanwhile, clean mixing bowl and make dip.
Place all chive dip ingredients in mixing bowl and mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer to a serving bowl and garnish with extra chives (if using). Serve dip with warm potato roly-polies.
